PiwikMobile.RedirectIfTabletDescription: Automatically open Matomo Mobile if a tablet is detected?
PiwikMobile.RedirectIfSmartphoneDescription: Automatically open Matomo Mobile if a smartphone is detected?
PiwikMobile.SettingsIntroduction: Here you can define your custom PiwikMobile settings. If you change your settings, it does not effect any other users. Note: Detection of mobile devices is currently experimental and might not work for your device. Changes will be applied after next log in.
